Uses of Class
info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope.Scope

  • Packages that use Scope 
    Package Description
    info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope  

    • Uses of Scope in info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope

      Methods in info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope that return Scope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Scope ScopeManager.getCurrentScope()
      Get current scope for running thread.
      static Scope ScopeManager.newLocalScope()
      Creates new Scope using current scope of running thread as parent.
      static Scope ScopeManager.newScopeWithParent(Scope parentScope)
      Creates new Scope with defined parent scope and notifies all the subscribed ScopeCreationObserver's.
      Methods in info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.scope with parameters of type Scope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Scope ScopeManager.newScopeWithParent(Scope parentScope)
      Creates new Scope with defined parent scope and notifies all the subscribed ScopeCreationObserver's.
      void ScopeCreationObserver.onCreateScope(Scope scope, Scope parentScope)
      Will be called by ScopeManager when new scope is created.
      static void ScopeManager.setScope(Scope scope)
      Set current scope for running thread
      static ScopeGuard ScopeGuard.withNewLocalScope(Scope parentScope)
      Creates an ScopeGuard which on creation sets current scope to new scope with defined parent scope.
      static ScopeGuard ScopeGuard.withScope(Scope scope)
      Creates an ScopeGuard which on creation sets current scope to defined one.
